node.rawMarkdownBody:
Part of Sheroes Revoluciones, Vim is an ad-hoc installation that
reflects on the normalisation of digital violence in our day to day lives.

A collection of diversified works including; interactive light sculpture,
brain wave prints, video art, Virtual Gardens, AI, alternative universes,
musical machines alongside many other creative investigations.

Between 8-10 March 2018 “Unsung sheroes” was selected to be part of Sheroes,
Lon-art’s third Social Exhibition, championing little-known women warriors,
leading ladies and unsung stars.

Collective exhibition curated by the XAP Cross art Projects Collective.
21 international artists investigate our symbiotic relationships with technology.
